Contracts

Interface ICustomerRMIServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BankServerRMI, CustomerRMIClient

    public interface ICustomerRMIServer
    Defines the customer's server API contract (excludes any manager operation).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Customer getCustomer(Bank bank, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Allows to retrieve a single customer information
      Loan getLoan(Bank bank, int accountNumber, java.lang.String password, long loanAmount)
      Will create a new loan for the given account after validating the customer's credit line against all banks.
      int openAccount(Bank bank, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String emailAddress, java.lang.String phoneNumber, java.lang.String password)
      Allows a client to create a new account
      Customer signIn(Bank bank, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Allows to validate a customer's credential on the server.

                java.lang.String firstName,
                java.lang.String lastName,
                java.lang.String emailAddress,
                java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                java.lang.String password)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Allows a client to create a new account
        Parameters:
        bank - has to corresponds to the server's bank Identity
        firstName -
        lastName -
        emailAddress -
        phoneNumber - Format: 514.000.1111
        password - No complexity validation performed at the moment on password
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Standard Remote interface exception. See RMI documentation.

      • getLoan

        Loan getLoan(Bank bank,
             int accountNumber,
             java.lang.String password,
             long loanAmount)
      throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
             javax.security.auth.login.FailedLoginException
        Will create a new loan for the given account after validating the customer's credit line against all banks. (credit line should be inferior or equal to the customer's credit line at this bank, including the new loan)

        password -
        loanAmount -
        Returns:
        Throws:
